attributes.action: Save jobs in Darley Dale in a Recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Derbyshire Dales District Council are trying to close Firth Rixson forgings(In a recession) The result of which will directly make 160 people unemployed and have a devastating effect on the local community. The council have spent 200,000 pounds in the process with a further £100,000 planned to spend to fight the company through a court of law.( Whilst increasing Council tax and blaming the labour governement - funding cuts, to pay for it.)
This is down to a noise issue which the council will not provide an acceptable level to continue working at !
The Council will not work for the good of the community they represent which i am afraid is what seems to be wrong with Politcs today !!!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Derbyshire Dales District Council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
